VFour Shortener

on November 25, 2017 at 11:42 pm

VFour or VVVV.ga is a free shortener URL created by TryHTML launched on November 17, 2017 as they said on their Instagram account on one of their posts. Basically VFour is like bit.ly, goo.gl & cutt.us free to use, but at this time Try HTML arenâ€™t offering custom links, but they announced, they will be working on it for next year. Those are some of the links examples created with VFour.

  • 19cah.com becomes: http://vvvv.ga/dBVP7v
  • github.com/tryht becomes: http://vvvv.ga/mndFZO
  • 19cah.com becomes: http://vvvv.ga/oOLEAw
  • tryht.ml becomes: http://vvvv.ga/ziE9M0
  • tryhtml.org becomes: http://vvvv.ga/Vsv6DL
  • tryhtml.store becomes: http://vvvv.ga/tG3kNH
